thread.title: BRIEF-Altice USA Says On Jan 29 Co's Unit Issued $1 Bln Aggregate Principal Amount Of 5.375 pct Senior Guaranteed Notes Due 2028

title: BRIEF-Altice USA Says On Jan 29 Co's Unit Issued $1 Bln Aggregate Principal Amount Of 5.375 pct Senior Guaranteed Notes Due 2028

organizations.name: brief-altice usa says on jan 29 co

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Altice USA Inc:
* ALTICE USA SAYS ON JAN 29 COâ€˜S UNIT ISSUED $1 BILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 5.375% SENIOR GUARANTEED NOTES DUE 2028 - SEC FILING
* ALTICE USA INC - PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO REFINANCE CERTAIN EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS OF ISSUER & CABLEVISION SYSTEMS CORPORATION
* ALTICE USA INC - PROCEEDS WILL ALSO BE USED FUND A DIVIDEND OF $1,500.0 MILLION TO CO (THROUGH CABLEVISION) Source text ( bit.ly/2GGDqqG ) Further company coverage:
